title: Similar handwritten script?
content:
Can someone recommend a webfont for body text similar to the following handwritten script?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803151418im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Bonnies2_4373.jpg)
author: chrisburton

comments.content:
One candidate is So Prolix. I don't really care for the 'N' character.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/so-prolix/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803151418/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/so-prolix/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/so-prolix/")
